1.name: Experimental Cruiser
1.description: After combat, increases experience gained by Light Cruisers and Heavy Cruisers by 5% (15%)

2.name: Full Firepower
2.description: 30% (60%) activation every 20s: For 10 seconds, increases own FP by 20% (40%)

3.name: The Unstable Inventor
3.description:
Use a random piece of prototype equipment with various effects every 12 seconds:
 ★(17%) Prototype Gun Type 0: 6x56dmg HE (Main Gun Efficiency 120%, Armor Modifier 135%/95%/70%)
 ★(17%) Prototype Chain Torpedos: 12x32 dmg (Armor Modifier 80%/100%/130%)
 ★(14%) Yuubari Fireworks: 1x10 dmg Normal (Armor Modifier 100%/80%/60%)
 ★(14%) 18s Endurance: Shield that can take 60 hits
 ★(14%) 6s Endurance: Shield that can take 99 hits
 ★(14%) Entire fleet recovers 2.4% of Yuubari's Max HP
 ★(10%) Band-aid: Heals all friendly ships for 9 HP

4.name: Full Barrage I (II)
4.description: Every 12 (8) times the main battery is fired, trigger Full Barrage - Yuubari I (II)

2.name: Yuubari (Retrofit)
2.description: New equipment, finally completed! Master, let's perform a live test in a real battle immediately!

limitBreak.tier1: Gains Full Barrage I / Main Gun Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier2: Max Torpedo Capacity +1 / Pre-Loaded Torpedo +1 / Torpedo Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Upgrades Full Barrage I→II / Torpedo Efficiency +15%

2.chinese: 重樱夕张级轻巡洋舰“夕张”。虽然受到了海军条约的限制，但应用了许多实验性的新设计。在太平洋战争中作为水雷旗舰在各处活跃。酸素鱼雷？好想弄来几枚研究一下啊
2.chineseTL: Sakura Empire's Yuubari-class light cruiser, Yuubari. Despite being limited by the Naval Treaty, many new, experimental designs have been applied on me. During the Pacific Wars, I was in active service everywhere as flagship of a torpedo division. What is it, you want to taste Yuubari's oxygen torpedoes?
2.japanese: 重桜夕張型軽巡洋艦夕張。設計は海軍条約の制限を受けたけど、逆に新しいギミックが数多く応用されたぞ。太平洋戦争では水雷戦隊の旗艦として活躍した。むむむ、酸素魚雷、研究しに何本か手に入れたいな…
2.japaneseTL: I'm Yuubari, a Sakura Empire Yuubari-class Light Cruiser. A naval treaty imposed limitations on my design, although as a result, many new gimmicks were applied to me. I served as the flagship of destroyer squadrons during the Pacific War. Mmpf, I wish I could get my hands on some books for my research on oxygen torpedoes…

3.chinese: 轻巡洋舰“夕张”号，主人好像在哪里见过我？不，不可能，我可没有兄弟姐妹
3.chineseTL: Light cruiser Yuubari, Master has seen me from somewhere before? I-impossible, I don't have any siblings.
3.japanese: 私は軽巡洋艦・「夕張」。ご主人はどこかで私と会ったことあるって？むむむ…あ、ありえん…私に姉妹などいないはず…
3.japaneseTL: I'm Yuubari, the light cruiser. Master, you say you've seen me somewhere before? Mmpf… th-that's impossible… I shouldn't have any sisters…

4.chinese: 有主人在的话，夕张就什么都不怕了
4.chineseTL: If Master is here, then Yuubari has nothing to fear.
4.japanese: ご主人さえいれば、夕張はもう何も怖くない…！
4.japaneseTL: So long as my Master is here, Yuubari fears nothing…!

5.chinese: 无论是锅炉还是别的什么，夕张可都是最先进的
5.chineseTL: Whether it be the boiler or something else, Yuubari is the most advanced-
5.japanese: 缶でも兵装でも、夕張のが一番先進的だぞ（ドヤッ
5.japaneseTL: Be it boilers or armaments, Yuubari's ones are the most advanced (smug.)

7.chinese: 蜜瓜？好想尝尝是什么味道呢
7.chineseTL: Melon? I want to taste it.
7.japanese: メロン？すごく食べてみたい…
7.japaneseTL: A melon? I'd really like to taste one…

8.chinese: 猫鲨？那么恐怖的鱼为什么会被叫做猫呢？
8.chineseTL: Catshark? Why would such a scary fish have 'cat' in its name?
8.japanese: ガトー、怖い…あんな怖いのにネコの名前とかなくね？
8.japaneseTL: Gato sounds scary… Even though it's scary, doesn't it sound sort of like a cat's name?

9.chinese: 呜~指挥官的手暖暖的好舒服~
9.chineseTL: Mmm~ Commander's hand is so warm and comfortable~
9.japanese: ご主人の手、暖かくて気持ちい～
9.japaneseTL: Master's hand is nice and warm~

10.japanese: ん…うっ…あぅ～～～もう噛むよ！

11.chinese: 主人有点幼稚呢，嘻嘻，不过夕张并不讨厌哦
11.chineseTL: Master seems a bit childish, hehe, but Yuubari doesn't mind
11.japanese: ご主人もちょっと子供っぽいね。ふふふ。でも夕張はこんなご主人が嫌いではないぞ
11.japaneseTL: Master seems a bit childish. Hehehe. But Yuubari doesn't dislike Master doing this

12.chinese: 还有待完成的任务……可惜夕张的研究好像对此派不上用场
12.chineseTL: There are still unfinished missions... unfortunately it seems like Yuubari's research can't be applied there
12.japanese: 未完了の任務……むむむ、残念ながら夕張、研究の成果は役に立たない模様…
12.japaneseTL: There are unfinished missions… Mmpf, I'm sorry to say this, but it seems like the results of Yuubari's research cannot be applied there...

13.chinese: 主人，任务完成之后，差不多就是午睡时间了吧
13.chineseTL: Master, after completing the task, it's about time to take an afternoon nap.
13.japanese: ご主人。任務完了したら、そろそろ昼寝の時間かな？
13.japaneseTL: Master, once the missions are complete, wouldn't it be about time for an afternoon nap?

14.chinese: 这封信件看起来有点可疑，主人要不要拆开看看？
14.chineseTL: This mail looks a bit suspicious...is Master going to open it up?
14.japanese: むむむ、怪しいメール…ご主人~開けてみてよ~
14.japaneseTL: Mmpf, a suspicious mail… Master~ Open it up~

15.chinese: 数据收集完毕，接下来就去改进装备吧
15.chineseTL: Data collection completed, let's go improve the equipment next.
15.japanese: データ収集完了。次は装備のカイゼンね
15.japaneseTL: Data collection complete. Next up would be equipment improvement.

16.chinese: 委托完成了！唔，不知道有没有带礼物回来呀
16.chineseTL: Commission completed! Mmm, I wonder if any gifts got brought back.
16.japanese: 委託完了だ！むむむ、お土産あるかな…
16.japaneseTL: The commission is complete! Mmpf, I wonder if they brought any souvenirs…

17.japanese: むむむ、詰め込みすぎたかも…
17.japaneseTL: Mmpf, I may have tried to fit too much in…

18.chinese: 新型武装实战测试——开始！
18.chineseTL: Real combat test of new type armaments —— start!
18.japanese: 新型兵装実戦テストーー始めっ！
18.japaneseTL: Live combat testing for new armament… Begin!

19.chinese: 这样主人也能稍微认识到更新装备的重要性了吧
19.chineseTL: With this, master understands a bit more of the importance of equipment upgrades.
19.japanese: これでご主人も装備更新の大切さが少しわかったかな
19.japaneseTL: Does Master now know a little more about the importance of improving your equipment?

20.chinese: 呜哇……等有了更好的装备后，就不会再输了！
20.chineseTL: Wuah......after I get better equipment, I will not lose again!
20.japanese: はわわ！……新しい装備ができたら二度と負けないぞ！
20.japaneseTL: Hawawa! …Once I get new equipment I won't lose to you again!

21.chinese: 尝尝最新武器的威力吧！
21.chineseTL: Taste the power of the latest weapons!
21.japaneseTL: Taste the power of my new weapons!

22.chineseTL: Wuu......but it's fine as long as the weapons are undamaged.
22.japanese: うぅ……兵装が無事ならいいけど…
22.japaneseTL: Uuh… As long as the armaments aren't damaged…

23.chinese: 主人，能请你不要靠近夕张吗？
23.chineseTL: Master, can you not get close to Yuubari?
23.japanese: ご主人、夕張には近寄らないでもらえる？
23.japaneseTL: Master, can you please not come close to Yuubari?

24.chinese: 主人，眼睛盯着夕张是在想什么呢？嘻嘻，夕张的感觉可是很敏锐的哦~
24.chineseTL: Master, what are you thinking of while staring at Yuubari? Hehe, my senses are very sharp.
24.japanese: ご主人、夕張をじっと見つめて何を考えてるの？ふふふ、夕張はこういうのに結構鋭いぞ～
24.japaneseTL: Master, what's on your mind while you stare at Yuubari? Hehehe, Yuubari is quite perceptive of these things~

25.chinese: 比起出征夕张更喜欢呆在港口，这里才是夕张的家呢。有碧蓝的海面和温暖的太阳……呜…呼呼…
25.chineseTL: Rather than heading out, Yuubari likes to stay at the dorkyard more, because this is Yuubari's home. The azure sea and the warm Sun......mmm...fuu...fuu...
25.japanese: 夕張、出撃よりやっぱり母港にいるほうがいいなあ。ここぞ夕張のお家。青き海に眩しくて暖かい太陽……うぅ…ふむむ……Zzzzz
25.japaneseTL: Yuubari prefers to stay in port rather than sortie after all. This is Yuubari's home. The blue ocean and the dazzling warm Sun… Auh… Mmmf… Zzzzz.

26.chinese: 主人喜欢什么样的女孩子呢？夕张先说？夕张喜欢像主人这样的人哦
26.chineseTL: What type of girl does the Master like? You want me to say it first? Yuubari likes someone like Master the most.
26.japanese: ご主人はどんな娘がタイプかな？夕張かな？夕張は、ご主人のような人が好きだよ~
26.japaneseTL: What type of girl does Master fancy? A girl like Yuubari perhaps? Yuubari likes people like you, Master~

27.chinese: 主人，你也想来午睡吗？这是夕张最喜欢的枕头，枕着的话是不是就能梦到夕张的梦了呢？如果那样的话……嘻嘻！
27.chineseTL: Master, do you want to take a nap as well? This is Yuubari's favorite pillow; would you dream about Yuubari if you use it? In that case......hehe!
27.japanese: ご主人もお昼寝？はい、これは夕張の一番お気に入りの枕。さてこの枕、もしかしたら夢の中で夕張と出会える枕かも?もしそうなら……へへへ♪
27.japaneseTL: About to take a nap, Master? Here, this is Yuubari's favorite pillow. Who knows, if you use this pillow, you might meet Yuubari in your dreams, perhaps? If that happens… Ehehe♪

28.chinese: 以后每个早上，主人睁开眼第一个看到的都会是夕张呢，嘻嘻！
28.chineseTL: From now on, the first thing that Master sees every morning while opening his eyes would be Yuubari, hehe!
28.japanese: 嬉しい♪これからご主人が毎日朝目が覚めた時、真っ先に目に入るのは夕張になるのだぞ！えへへ♪
28.japaneseTL: I'm so happy♪ From now on when Master wakes up in the morning, the first thing he sees will be Yuubari! Ehehe♪

29.chinese: 唔唔，巧克力的“改良”来不及了吗…没办法了，这个“情人节巧克力试做型改二”先送给指挥官吧。吃完后记得写“意见书”反馈给我
29.chineseTL: Hmph, the chocolate's "Improvement" couldn't make it in time... It can't be helped then, I'll give Commander this "Valentine's Chocolate Prototype Mk II" for now. Once you're done eating, remember to submit this "Suggestion Form"
29.japanese: むむっ、チョコの「カイゼン」は間に合わなかった…仕方ない、この「ばれんたいんせんようチョコしさくがたかいに」を指揮官に渡すよ。食べたらこの「イケンショ」を書いて、私に返してね。
29.japaneseTL: Hmph, the chocolate's "Improvement" couldn't make it in time... It can't be helped then, Commander can have this "Valentine-only Chocolate Prototype Number Two". After you've eaten it, fill in this "Suggestion Form" and return it to me.

30.chinese: 主人，我把制作巧克力的蛮啾们借给你一天，想吃的话指挥它们就可以。夕张已经做了“改善”，不管怎样的巧克力它们都能做哦，确定确定，嗯嗯
30.chineseTL: Master, I'll lend you these chocolate-making Manjuus for one day, if you want to eat you can just order them. Yuubari already completed the "Improvements", they are able to make any kind of chocolate. Confirmed confirmed, hmmm.
30.japanese: ご主人、チョコーーを作る饅頭たちを一日だけ貸すから、チョコが食べたければ饅頭たちに指示していいよ。どんなチョコでも作れるよう夕張が「カイゼン」したから、ニジュウマル、うんうん。
30.japaneseTL: Master, I'll lend you these chocolate-making Manjuus for one day, so if you want to eat chocolate you can just order the Manjuus. Yuubari already completed the "Improvements" so they are able to make any kind of chocolate. Confirmed confirmed, hmmm.

1.chinese: 新的装备终于完成了！事不宜迟，马上来试试看实战效果如何吧，主人
1.chineseTL: The new equipment is complete! Without further ado, let's try it out in battle, Master!
1.japanese: 新しい装備、ついに完成！ご主人、すぐに実戦でテストを行おう！
1.japaneseTL: New equipment, finally completed! Master, let's perform a live test in a real battle immediately!

2.chinese: 主人，今天也来帮夕张一起收集数据吧？
2.chineseTL: Master, will you help Yuubari collect data again today?

3.chinese: 明石非常热心地给夕张的研究提供了很多帮助，但总觉得她好像有什么别的目的...
3.chineseTL: Akashi seems very enthusiastic in providing help with Yuubari's research, but I get a feeling she has other purposes in mind...

4.chinese: 研究总是会伴随着失败......不过有主人的支持，这些困难都不算什么！
4.chineseTL: Research is always accompanied by failures... but with Master's support, these difficulties don't mean anything!

5.chinese: 唔...夕张有点累了...能在这里小睡一会吗？
5.chineseTL: Hmm... Yuubari is a bit tired... can I take a nap here?

6.chinese: 现在的话，就算遇到猫鲨级我也不会怕了，大概
6.chineseTL: The current me won't be afraid anymore even if I meet a Gato-class, probably

7.chinese: 主人也要记得好好休息哦？
7.chineseTL: Master must remember to take a good rest too

9.chinese: 嗯嗯，这次的数据收集也很成功呢
9.chineseTL: Hmm, the data collection was successful this time as well

10.chinese: 重新认识到更新装备的重要性了吧，主人？
10.chineseTL: Do you recognize the importance of upgrading equipment, Master?

11.chinese: 唔...看来装备更新还不够...
11.chineseTL: Hmph... seems like the equipment upgrades aren't enough still
